articles.title: Dolly Parton to donate $1 million to Hurricane Helene relief efforts
articles.description: Country music legend Dolly Parton has pledged $1 million to assist victims of Hurricane Helene through the Mountain Ways Foundation.

articles.title: Garth Brooks accused of rape in lawsuit
articles.description: A hair and makeup artist has filed a lawsuit alleging that country music star Garth Brooks raped her five years ago in a Los Angeles hotel. Brooks denies the claims and says he went to court to stop the woman from filing the lawsuit.

articles.title: Bruce Springsteen endorses Harris, condemns Trump
articles.description: Rock star Bruce Springsteen spoke out in a video and said Trump should be disqualified from ever being president again.
